analysis.description:
CryptoWorldCupToken._payout (/unique_contracts/0x54a59636b72bfbeff295700dc3bdce02b6b5b619.sol#796-806) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- ceoAddress.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0x54a59636b72bfbeff295700dc3bdce02b6b5b619.sol#801-804)
	- _to.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0x54a59636b72bfbeff295700dc3bdce02b6b5b619.sol#804-806)
